segments.text: I notice the garden outside the window looks so peaceful and well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the chaos unfolding inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The path and low bushes look inviting, like a perfect place to relax.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the calmness just by looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a shame that the inside of the house doesn't match the tranquility of the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman ever takes a moment to enjoy her garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Maybe if she did, she wouldn't be so absorbed in her chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of longing, wishing I could step into that garden and leave the chaos behind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a little oasis out there, completely separate from the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think I need more gardens in my life.
segments.speaker: PAR
